channel.title: CVE Feed for SUSE -- obs-service-source_validator

item.title: CVE-2017-9274|2024-09-16T18:59:31.976Z -- suse -- obs-service-source_validator
item.description: A shell command injection in the obs-service-source_validator before 0.7 could be used to execute code as the packager when checking RPM SPEC files with specific macro constructs.
